info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 4:44PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact Highway 2 between mile markers 186 and 196, including Marias Pass, through 545 PM MST... At 441 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower 13 miles southwest of East Glacier Park Village, or 40 miles east of Evergreen, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in difficult driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Blacktail and Marias Pass. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 186 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
